sentences.sentence: Taxonomists renamed it Apatosaurus in 1903 when it was discovered that two different names referred to the same dinosaur.
sentences.translation: 1903年，当发现有两个不同的名字指代这一恐龙时，分类学家们将它重新命名为 Apatosaurus。

sentences.sentence: New methods developed in genetic research have led taxonomists to revise their views on the evolutionary relationships between many species.
sentences.translation: 遗传研究中出现的新方法使分类学家修正了他们对许多物种间进化关系的看法。

sentences.sentence: When the idea was proposed, it was expected to be a boon to taxonomists trying to name the world's millions of species.
sentences.translation: 此想法一经提出，它就有助于分类学者为数百万物种指名道姓。
